path.purpose: Attempts to access phpMyAdmin, often targeted for SQL injection or admin access.

cve.description: A static code injection vulnerability in phpMyAdmin versions before 2.11.9.5 and 3.x before 3.1.3.1. Attackers can inject arbitrary PHP code into a configuration file via a crafted POST request.
A local file inclusion (LFI) vulnerability in phpMyAdmin 4.8.x before 4.8.2. Improper validation of whitelisted pages allows attackers to include and potentially execute arbitrary files.

path.purpose: Tries to access environment variable files that may contain secrets or credentials.

cve.description: Laravel Ignition (before 2.5.2) allows unauthenticated remote code execution via insecure use of file_get_contents() and file_put_contents() when debug mode is enabled.

path.purpose: Targets Microsoft Outlook Web Access login pages.

cve.description: A Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Microsoft Exchange Server. It allows unauthenticated attackers to send arbitrary HTTP requests and authenticate as the Exchange server.

path.purpose: Cisco VPN login page, often scanned for credential harvesting.

cve.description: A directory traversal vulnerability in Cisco ASA and FTD software. An unauthenticated attacker can read arbitrary files from the web services file system.

path.purpose: Exchange server endpoint, targeted for remote code execution.

cve.description: Insecure deserialization vulnerability in Microsoft Exchange Server. Exploiting this allows remote code execution with SYSTEM privileges, typically as part of the ProxyLogon chain.

path.purpose: Looks for environment files in subdirectories.

cve.description: Laravel Ignition (before 2.5.2) allows unauthenticated remote code execution via insecure use of file_get_contents() and file_put_contents() when debug mode is enabled.

path.purpose: Attempts to access VS Code deployment credentials.
Tries to access Git repository configuration, which can expose internal structure.

cve.description: Jenkins Stapler framework allows remote code execution by invoking unintended Java methods via crafted URLs. Affects Jenkins 2.153 and earlier.

path.purpose: Used to find PHP info pages that leak server configuration.

cve.description: A buffer overflow in PHP-FPM (FastCGI Process Manager) in certain configurations allows remote code execution. Affects PHP 7.1.x < 7.1.33, 7.2.x < 7.2.24, and 7.3.x < 7.3.11.

path.purpose: Looks for exposed configuration files that may contain API keys or secrets.
